## Camera.constructRay() method

Constructs a ray based on the given screen coordinates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructRay(x: number, y: number): Ray;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | The x-component of the screen coordinates, relative to the top-left corner of the viewport. |
|  y | number | The y-component of the screen coordinates, relative to the top-left corner of the viewport. |

**Returns:**

[Ray](doc/markdown/./base.ray.md)

The ray originating from the camera position and passing through the given screen coordinates.
